summary: This document is a declaration by Rick V. Haas, the custodian of records for Experian, in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena dated June 29, 2020. It certifies the authenticity and reliability of the records provided in compliance with the subpoena, affirming that they were created in the regular course of business.

persons.name: Rick V. Haas
persons.context: Rick V. Haas declares under penalty of perjury regarding the records requested by the Grand Jury Subpoena.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The Assistant United States Attorney signed the Grand Jury Subpoena requesting records from Experian.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: A Grand Jury Subpoena was issued requesting specified records from Experian.

events.title: Declaration Executed
events.description: Rick V. Haas executed a declaration certifying the records provided in response to the subpoena.

keyFacts: Rick V. Haas is the custodian of records for Experian.
The declaration was made in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena dated June 29, 2020.
The records were certified to be made in the regular course of business.
The declaration was executed on August 11, 2020.
